alert.note: Alert for Hubbard; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:22AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hubbard and northeastern Wadena Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 922 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntersville, or 47 miles south of Bemidji, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Badoura around 925 AM CDT. Chamberlain and Nevis around 930 AM CDT. Akeley around 935 AM CDT. Benedict around 940 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Laporte and Guthrie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
